entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a multinational technology company and one of the world's leading manufacturers of graphics processing units (GPUs) and related technologies.

entities.name: MELLANOX
entities.description: Mellanox is a company acquired by NVIDIA Corporation in fiscal year 2021, resulting in the recording of deferred tax liabilities and long-term tax liabilities.

entities.name: BRITISH VIRGIN ISLANDS
entities.description: A jurisdiction where NVIDIA Corporation earns income that is subject to lower taxes than the U.S. federal statutory tax rate.

entities.name: ISRAEL
entities.description: A jurisdiction where NVIDIA Corporation earns income that is subject to lower taxes than the U.S. federal statutory tax rate. NVIDIA also has subsidiaries here with undistributed earnings intended for indefinite reinvestment.

entities.name: HONG KONG
entities.description: A jurisdiction where NVIDIA Corporation earns income that is subject to lower taxes than the U.S. federal statutory tax rate.

entities.name: UNITED KINGDOM
entities.description: A jurisdiction where NVIDIA Corporation has subsidiaries with cumulative undistributed earnings intended for indefinite reinvestment.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA Corporation acquired Mellanox in fiscal year 2021, resulting in the recording of deferred tax liabilities and long-term tax liabilities.
NVIDIA Corporation earns income in the British Virgin Islands, which is subject to lower taxes than the U.S. federal statutory tax rate.

NVIDIA Corporation earns income in Israel, which is subject to lower taxes than the U.S. federal statutory tax rate. NVIDIA also has subsidiaries here with undistributed earnings intended for indefinite reinvestment.
NVIDIA Corporation earns income in Hong Kong, which is subject to lower taxes than the U.S. federal statutory tax rate.
NVIDIA Corporation has subsidiaries in the United Kingdom with cumulative undistributed earnings intended for indefinite reinvestment.
